channel.title: Skillcape shop bug [PI]

item.title: Skillcape shop bug [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

Okay so if you get 99 Summoning, and then buy Summoning cape from the skill cape shop you get a 99 Dungeoneering Cape even though you’re not 99 in Dung…

Is there a solution to fix that?

Here is the code in my ShopAssistant

/*public int[][] skillCapes = {{0,9747,4319,2679},{1,2683,4329,2685},{2,2680,4359,2682},{3,2701,4341,2703},{4,2686,4351,2688},{5,2689,4347,2691},{6,2692,4343,2691},
									{7,2737,4325,2733},{8,2734,4353,2736},{9,2716,4337,2718},{10,2728,4335,2730},{11,2695,4321,2697},{12,2713,4327,2715},{13,2725,4357,2727},
									{14,2722,4345,2724},{15,2707,4339,2709},{16,2704,4317,2706},{17,2710,4361,2712},{18,2719,4355,2721},{19,2737,4331,2739},{20,2698,4333,2700}};*/
				public int[] skillCapes = {9747,9753,9750,9768,9756,9759,9762,9801,9807,9783,9798,9804,9780,9795,9792,9774,9771,9777,9786,9810,9765,9948,12169,18508};
		public int get99Count() {
			int count = 0;
			for (int j = 0; j < c.playerLevel.length; j++) {
				if (c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[j]) >= 99) {
					count++;				
				}			
			}		
			return count;
		}

As you can see, 18508 is Dungeoneering cape, and 12169 is the Summoning cape. They are all listed in order yet when you buy the Summoning cape you get a Dungeoneering cape.

Read full topic
